    • editEmployee

      @PostMapping("/employees/{id}/edit") public String editEmployee(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @ModelAttribute("employee") Employee employee)
      Processes the edit employee form submission. Updates the employee's details in the employee repository.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the employee
      employee - the updated employee object
      Returns:
      the URL for redirecting to the employee list page
